ItemDefinition.name: Common Projectiles
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain a little attack damage

ItemDefinition.name: Epic Projectiles
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain some attack damage

ItemDefinition.name: Legend Projectiles
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain a lot attack damage

ItemDefinition.name: Auto Rifle
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain a little attack speed

ItemDefinition.name: Better Shooting Part
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain some attack speed

ItemDefinition.name: Computed Replenishing System
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain a lot attack speed

ItemDefinition.name: Bullet Thruster
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain bullet speed

ItemDefinition.name: Relic Engine
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain moving speed

ItemDefinition.name: Trident
ItemDefinition.detail: The player can shoot in three directions, lose attack speed

ItemDefinition.name: Unstable Machine Gun
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain a little attack speed, the player's bullets may start with a little bias

ItemDefinition.name: Sea Pike
ItemDefinition.detail: The player's bullet can pass through enemy, lose attack damage, gain bullet speed, lose bullet lifetime

ItemDefinition.name: Engine Cooldown System
ItemDefinition.detail: Less dashing cooldown

ItemDefinition.name: Engine Amplifier
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain more dashing distance

ItemDefinition.name: Demon's Insane Chip
ItemDefinition.detail: Lose one max health, gain attack damage

ItemDefinition.name: Heavy Armor
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 2 max health, lose moving speed

ItemDefinition.name: Light Armor
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 1 max health

ItemDefinition.name: G15 Shield
ItemDefinition.detail: Generate a shield, charge 2, gain 2 charges every level

ItemDefinition.name: Revenge Speed System
ItemDefinition.detail: Whenever the player is damaged, gain speed and attack damage in seconds

ItemDefinition.name: Unstable Adhesuve
ItemDefinition.detail: The player's bullets will explode and deal range damage

ItemDefinition.name: Projectile Speed Converter
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain attack damage, lose bullet speed

ItemDefinition.name: Revenge Bullet System
ItemDefinition.detail: Whenever the player is damaged, shoot revenging bullets like machine gun

ItemDefinition.name: Demon's Self-harm equipment
ItemDefinition.detail: Deal direct damage to the player, then keep shooting in 16 directons for a while

ItemDefinition.name: Crisis Awareness
ItemDefinition.detail: The player will be stronger(in moving speed and attack speed) when the player has less health(1,2,3)

ItemDefinition.name: Rabbit's Foot
ItemDefinition.detail: Have possibility to upgrade any items generated(gained) in the game to a higher level

ItemDefinition.name: Jiuce
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 2 max health

ItemDefinition.name: Wishing Bottle1
ItemDefinition.detail: Choose 1 level 1 item

ItemDefinition.name: Wishing Bottle2
ItemDefinition.detail: Choose 1 level 2 item

ItemDefinition.name: Wishing Bottle3
ItemDefinition.detail: Choose 1 level 3 item

ItemDefinition.name: Wilful
ItemDefinition.detail: When choosing items, the player can always use this skill to reject them and add 1 max health

ItemDefinition.name: Cat
ItemDefinition.detail: (only once)When the player die, respawn and recover only one health

ItemDefinition.name: Angel
ItemDefinition.detail: (only once)When the player die, respawn and recover half of your health

ItemDefinition.name: Armor Converter
ItemDefinition.detail: Whenever the player lose any health, 50% chance to gain 1 armor

ItemDefinition.name: Damage Management
ItemDefinition.detail: Whenever the player lose any armor, 50% chance to gain 1 health

ItemDefinition.name: Real Armor
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 1 max Armor

ItemDefinition.name: Real Armor2
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 2 max Armor

ItemDefinition.name: Pandora's Box
ItemDefinition.detail: Randomize all items owned by player(excluding this)

ItemDefinition.name: Shield Boost Unit
ItemDefinition.detail: Dash to your orientation and deal damage to the path according to your remain armor, whenever you kill any enemy by this item, gain 1 armor

ItemDefinition.name: Auto Locking Laser
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot locked laser to enemy, auto aiming

ItemDefinition.name: Durable Projectile
ItemDefinition.detail: Add bullet life time

ItemDefinition.name: Skill Book
ItemDefinition.detail: Choose 1 skill item

ItemDefinition.name: Weapon Contract
ItemDefinition.detail: Choose 1 sub-weapon item

ItemDefinition.name: Rash
ItemDefinition.detail: Cannot see the map, add 5 random faction room (no boss) to each floor, add movement speed

ItemDefinition.name: Impatient
ItemDefinition.detail: Cannot see items in the room, get a random level4 item immediately

ItemDefinition.name: Medical Insurance
ItemDefinition.detail: If the player is damaged, get 10 coins

ItemDefinition.name: Ship Toilet
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot more bullets, all bullets are shot in random direction

ItemDefinition.name: Rocket
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot a big explosive fast speed rocket

ItemDefinition.name: Mine
ItemDefinition.detail: Lay an explosive which will explode in several seconds

ItemDefinition.name: Asteriod
ItemDefinition.detail: Get an asteriod surrounding playership, block enemy projectiles and deal damage when collide with enemies

ItemDefinition.name: Pride of Arsenal
ItemDefinition.detail: Bullets become bigger, gain attack damage, lose bullet speed

ItemDefinition.name: Portable Upgrade Tool
ItemDefinition.detail: Spend money to enhance the player's attack damage, do not lose damage when lose this item

ItemDefinition.name: Millionaire's VIP Card
ItemDefinition.detail: The first time when you come in a shop room, if you have at least 100 coins, gain 1 max armor

ItemDefinition.name: Discount Card
ItemDefinition.detail: Items in shop are discounted

ItemDefinition.name: Service Discount Card
ItemDefinition.detail: Non-Items in shop are discounted

ItemDefinition.name: Portable Disassembler
ItemDefinition.detail: Deal damage to the player and gain coins(5-14)

ItemDefinition.name: BloodThirst
ItemDefinition.detail: Lose half(0.5) of your base attack, whenever you kill an enemy, +0.01 base attack, boss counts as 10 enemies, losing this item do not change your base attack

ItemDefinition.name: Driving License
ItemDefinition.description: Familier to Drive a Star Ship
ItemDefinition.detail: Add base attack damage, gain 1 max health, add movement speed

ItemDefinition.name: Coin Bag
ItemDefinition.description: This Will Not Happen In Reality
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 50 coins

ItemDefinition.name: Poison
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot poisonous bullets, deal persistent damage to enemy

ItemDefinition.name: Demon Contract
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain max health, attack damage, shoot speed, bullet speed, whenever you get to 1 health, spawn a small demon attacking you

ItemDefinition.name: Bribe
ItemDefinition.description: The Best Way to Remove Enemy
ItemDefinition.detail: If you have at least 100 coins, kill the nearest enemy(except the boss), gain 1 charge when you enter an enemy room, start no charge

ItemDefinition.name: Miser
ItemDefinition.detail: Your stats are decided by the amount of your money(multiply other modifier)

ItemDefinition.name: Vengeful Heart
ItemDefinition.detail: If player sustain damage, gain more attack, reset in next level(floor)

ItemDefinition.name: Laser
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot laser instead of bullet

ItemDefinition.name: Accelerator
ItemDefinition.detail: Add bullet speed, add attack speed

ItemDefinition.name: Flexible
ItemDefinition.detail: Add movement speed, Your damage is decided by your movement speed

ItemDefinition.name: Armor Assimilation
ItemDefinition.detail: Lose all max armor, gain the same amount of max health

ItemDefinition.name: Self-replicated Armor
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain an armor, charge 4, add 2 charges every level

ItemDefinition.name: Strange Mushroom
ItemDefinition.description: There Are No Changes on Me!
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 3 max health, gain more damage, lose attack speed, become bigger

ItemDefinition.name: Electromagnetic Gun
ItemDefinition.detail: Cost 1 coin to shoot a coin, deal high damage, if hit enemy, 80% chance give back the coin, 20% change get 2 coins

ItemDefinition.name: Virtual Currency
ItemDefinition.detail: Whenever you buy items in shops and have at least 100 coins left, add moving speed

ItemDefinition.name: Sprayer
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot spray instead of bullet

ItemDefinition.name: Spine Surface
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 1 max Armor, Deal damage when you collide with enemies

ItemDefinition.name: Solor Flame
ItemDefinition.detail: Deal 3 damage to every enemy in the room, charge 5, gain 5 charges every level, if there is no charge, you can still spend 10 coin to use

ItemDefinition.name: Time Stop
ItemDefinition.detail: Time Stop for 8 seconds, charge 2, gain 2 charges every level

ItemDefinition.name: Overhaul
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 3 max health and recover from all damage

ItemDefinition.name: Iatrophobia
ItemDefinition.detail: Cannot see your health, gain 2 max health, gain 2 max armor

ItemDefinition.name: Good Mushroom
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 1 max health, gain damage, gain moving speed, gain bullet speed, recover 1 health

ItemDefinition.name: Crew
ItemDefinition.detail: Cooldown of sub-weapon is set to 50%

ItemDefinition.name: Demon Book
ItemDefinition.detail: After you use your skill, if it has no charge, immedietely sustain 2 damages and gain 1 charge

ItemDefinition.name: Demon Heart
ItemDefinition.detail: Deal direct damage to lose 1 health, gain 1 max armor, charge 3, add 3 charges every level

ItemDefinition.name: First-Aid
ItemDefinition.detail: Spawn 5 health or armor pickup in room

ItemDefinition.name: Shotgun
ItemDefinition.detail: Lose attack damage, gain bullet speed, lose bullet life time

ItemDefinition.name: Missile
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot missile instead

ItemDefinition.name: Friend of GSA
ItemDefinition.detail: The first time when you come into a shop room, if you have at least 100 coins, gain 2 charges for your skill

ItemDefinition.name: Irritable
ItemDefinition.detail: Lose attack damage, gain attack speed

ItemDefinition.name: Bullet Enhancer
ItemDefinition.detail: Bullet's damage will increase depending on flying time
ItemDefinition.description: Bullet Damage Increase by Fly Time

ItemDefinition.name: Frozen Projectile
ItemDefinition.detail: Your bullet can slow down enemies

ItemDefinition.name: Teleport
ItemDefinition.detail: Teleport to cursor position, deal damage to enemies nearing to you, charge 5, add 5 charges every level

ItemDefinition.name: ItemDice
ItemDefinition.detail: Randomize all items in the room, charge 2, add 2 charges every level

ItemDefinition.name: Void Contract
ItemDefinition.detail: Items in shop will automatically replace after buying

ItemDefinition.name: Laser Wing Plane
ItemDefinition.detail: Get a wing plane shooting laser

ItemDefinition.name: Retinue
ItemDefinition.detail: Get a retinue shooting bullets diagonally

ItemDefinition.name: Wing Plane
ItemDefinition.detail: Get a wing plane shooting bullets like a machine gun

ItemDefinition.name: Electric Chain
ItemDefinition.detail: Shoot an electric chain which bounce off and damage max 4 enemies

ItemDefinition.name: Shop Wormhole
ItemDefinition.detail: Generate one level 1 shop in this level, charge 1, add 1 charge every level

ItemDefinition.name: Mutative Mushroom
ItemDefinition.description: Get Random Stats, Lose Random Stats
ItemDefinition.detail: Get Random stats, lose random stats

ItemDefinition.name: Painless
ItemDefinition.detail: Get Damage by empty(damaged) health

ItemDefinition.name: Bacteria Mushroom
ItemDefinition.detail: Add chance to shoot a spray when attacking

ItemDefinition.name: Demon Armor
ItemDefinition.detail: Gain 4 max armor, when the player is damaged, randomly lose armor or health

ItemDefinition.name: Happy Game
ItemDefinition.detail: Rerandomize all items when the player get damage, excluding self
